Function.Description: The range function function computes the difference between the smallest and largest elements found in the argument list.

Brief.Overview: The range function computes the difference between the smallest and largest elements found in the argument list. The list can contain Numbers, Cell references, or a Range of cells.
Brief.Usage: The range function computes the distance between the smallest and largest elements found in the argument list

Syntax.Return: Computes and returns the difference between the smallest and largest elements found in the argument list. If the range function cannot find any Analytic Information Server object that evaluates to a number, it returns 0.
